column4: How can I have it so I can have a folder or something to store music that I can listen to on either XP or Ubuntu. I have dual boot set up. I'd also like to be able to continue torrent downloads regardless of what OS I am on. How do I do this?
The same machine, or two different machines, one with Windows, the other ubuntu?
I have dual boot. Both OSes on the same machine. Two different HDs
Ubuntu can mount Windows partitions, but windows can't mount ubuntu partitions. It is better to store it on the windows side, so both sides could see them.
